properties.name: ljsa.jwt.subject-key
properties.description:
The "sub" (subject) claim identifies the principal that is the
   subject of the JWT

properties.name: ljsa.jwt.roles-key
properties.description: The "role" (role) claim listing the subject's roles

properties.name: ljsa.jwt.audience-key
properties.description: The audience of a token is the intended recipient of the token

properties.name: ljsa.jwt.signing-key
properties.description: Key used to sign the jwt
